extendedInfo.description: Do not get towed. Avoid tickets. Download this app to have the most up to date information about the street cleaning schedule in the city of Chicago. Every year from April 1st to November 30th, the Chicago Department of Streets and Sanitation (DSS) performs Chicago street sweeping and street cleaning services which requires individuals to move their cars usually 2 times per month. The City of Chicago will post temporary parking restriction signs on each city street the day before the work is scheduled to begin.As the street sweeping schedules are different for every Chicago city Ward, this app allows users to easily find the Chicago street sweeping schedule for their location in the city. The city of Chicago will issue $50 street sweeping tickets to every car parked on streets subject to cleaning from 9AM to 3PM on listed days. Furthermore, all parked cars are also subject to towing and additional fines. Our service allows users to avoid tickets and towing fees.Avoid unnecessary complications in your life. Stay ticket free. Download and use your pocket guide to Chicago street sweeping schedule.

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: This application should be listed on every welcome packet by property management companies. Would\'ve saved me $100!
reviews.author: John Friend

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: Been waiting for someone to build this - VERY HELPFUL..  Suggestion:  After I put in the address, tap the resulting schedule to automatically add that schedule to the Google calendar on my Android, with an option to choose the notification period on the calendar event (e.g. so I can set so my phone pops up a notification x days before the next street cleaning)
reviews.author: David Carno

reviews.title: So helpful.
reviews.comment: Thanks for making this app available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t work.
reviews.comment: Does not show street cleaning schedule.
reviews.author: Mark Milbauer

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: This saved me hundreds in tickets!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Sometimes has problems hooking up GPS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Tried it on 2 different Android devices and it doesn\'t work.    Can\'t find current location and app ends prematurely.  Needs to be updated!
reviews.author: Larry O
